metadata.title: USN-3120-1 -- Memcached vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Aleksandar Nikolic discovered that Memcached incorrectly handled certain malformed commands. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause Memcached to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3120-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  memcached - 1.4.25-2ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
